meanings.definition: The early part of the day from sunrise to noon.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the sun rises to start the day.
meanings.sent2: I love to have breakfast in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The morning birds chirping woke me up with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The morning of life is full of possibilities waiting to unfold.
meanings.sent5: The morning dew glistened on the grass, a sign of a fresh start.

meanings.definition: The first part or period of the day, extending from dawn, or from midnight, to noon.
meanings.sent1: In the morning, the world is quiet and peaceful.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys taking walks in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The morning rush hour traffic can be quite hectic.
meanings.sent4: The morning of a new day brings hope and opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The morning light gently woke her from her slumber.
